document_data.name: Saelethil Dlardrageth
document_data.mainbody:
'''Saelethil Dlardrageth''' was a [[sun elf]] inhabitant of [[Arcorar]] over five thousand years ago and created the [[Nightstar (selukiira)|Nightstar]], a selukiira in which he magically placed a copy of himself. He was tall and broad-shouldered.

{{Stub-person}}
